properties.name: phoneHash
properties.doc: Hashed phone number of the client
properties.usage: Used for recognizing clients without storing full phone number

test.name: meeting

properties.name: hostId
properties.doc: Id of the employee who is organizing / hosting this meeting
properties.usage: Meetings are specific for a single employee, using this link

properties.name: participantId
properties.doc: Id of the client who is invited to this meeting

test.doc: Represents a scheduled meeting between a host and a client
